meanings.definition: A small monetary unit in Ukraine, equal to one hundredth of a hryvnia.
meanings.sent1: In Ukraine, you can buy candies with just a few kopiykas.
meanings.sent2: She collected many kopiykas in her piggy bank.
meanings.sent3: The little girl pretended her toy was a magical kopiykas generator.
meanings.sent4: His love for her was worth more than a million kopiykas.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the falling kopiykas echoed in the empty street.
